contentList.content: Dark Ranger

Dark rangers are similar to their high elven cousins but focus on shadowcraft more than nature. Dark rangers are silent and invisible stalkers of the shadows, felling unsuspecting opponents with a single arrow. Dark rangers still favor the bow as the ultimate weapon, using the same arts that Quel'Thalas taught for millennia.
Necrotic Adept
Spells you cast ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. In addition, when you deal Necrotic damage with a spell, you cannot roll a [1].
Ilmater's Shot
Targets cannot regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> for 1 turn.
Black Arrow
An attack that applies a sickness that causes the target to explode on death. This explosion causes necrotic damage in a 3m radius and heals you.
Black Arrow Sickness
If the target dies while under this effect it will explode causing necrotic damage to all surrounding units within 3m. You will also be healed.
Black Arrow Explosion
The target of your Black Arrow will explode on death.
Toggle off to disable the explosion on death. You will still regain health.
Feral Senses
You are able to see <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBILITY">Invisible</LSTag> creatures up to [1] distance.
Valkrana's Shadowfell Shot
Fire [2] projectiles straight from the Shadowfell. Each deals [1]. Advantage against targets that are heavily obscured or in a Negative Energy Field.
Necrotic Shot
Your shot fires necrotic energy to harm the living or heal the undead.
Vampiric Shot
Can recast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_VampiricShot_Free">Vampiric Shot</LSTag> without expending a spell slot.
Fire a shot at an enemy to siphon their life force and regain half as many <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
For 10 turns, you can use Vampiric Shot again without expending an additional spell slot.
